title: L A G ! D:
body:
Since today im having +200 Ping! I've tried everything and nothing works.... Can Riot Tell me what is wrong? 

https://imgur.com/waSS4Fj
https://imgur.com/NX3gVjf
https://imgur.com/yhIlSS1
https://imgur.com/6ribt0F

replies.body: It looks like you've got a big connection issue, not just with ping but also accessing our servers at all.  Stick to custom games for now, and go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I use the Hextech Repair Tool and the problem is not solved..... C:
